snippet: The girl remained in critical condition and the police had not made any arrests as of late Friday.
abstract: Stray bullet enters home in Hempstead, NY, and critically injures young girl.
lead_paragraph: The girl remained in critical condition and the police had not made any arrests as of late Friday.

headline.print_headline: Bullet Fired From Street Hits Girl, 12, in Long Island Home
headline.main: Bullet Fired From Street Hits Girl, 12, in Her Long Island Home
